comment: Here's a fun contest: How many synonyms for awful can you come up with to describe eternallifestyle.com?
amr:
# ::snt Here's a fun contest: How many synonyms for awful can you come up with to describe eternallifestyle.com?
(c / contest-02
      :ARG2 (c2 / come-up-11
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (w / word
                  :quant (a / amr-unknown)
                  :ARG2-of (d / describe-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (u / url-entity
                              :value "eternallifestyle.com"))
                  :mod (a2 / awful))
            :ARG1-of (p / possible-01))
      :ARG1-of (f / fun-01)
      :location (h / here))

comment: It doesn't make sense to hate an entire race based on the actions of a few people.

                  :op2 (a2 / article

      :snt3 (e / especially

                  :topic (c / cure-01
                        :ARG0 (o2 / oil
                              :source (c2 / coconut))
                        :ARG1 (d / disease)))))
